mapper.select: select T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID , TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI, DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM from SNI.T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI where T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID =#{t_idoss_verifikasi_id}

select T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID , TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI, DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM from T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI where NIK_PELAKSANA =#{nik_pelaksana}

select T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID , TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI, DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM from T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI where STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN =#{status_permohonanasman}

select T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID , TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI, DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM from T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI where STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER =#{status_permohonanmanager}

select T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID , TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI, DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM from T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI where NIK_PELAKSANA =#{nik_pelaksana} and STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN =#{status_permohonanasman}

select T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID , TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI, DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM from SNI.T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI where NIK_PELAKSANA =#{nik_pelaksana} and STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER =#{status_permohonanmanager}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNI.T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI( T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID, TGL_PERMOHONAN, URGENSI,DAMPAK, TYPE_PERMOHONAN, NIK_PELAKSANA, RFS, CATATAN_PERTYPE, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN, UPDATED_ASMAN, CATATAN_ASMAN, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER, UPDATED_MANAGER, CATATAN_MANAGER, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_GM, CATATAN_GM, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM ) VALUES ( #{t_idoss_verifikasi_id}, #{tgl_permohonan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{urgensi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'MINOR', #{type_permohonan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nik_pelaksana,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catatan_per_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status_permohonanasman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated_asman,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catatan_asman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status_permohonanmanager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated_manager,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catatan_manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated_gm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catatan_gm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status_permohonan_gm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update SNI.T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI set TGL_PERMOHONAN = #{tgl_permohonan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, URGENSI = #{urgensi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAMPAK = #{dampak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_PERMOHONAN = #{type_permohonan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NIK_PELAKSANA = #{nik_pelaksana,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RFS = #{rfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATATAN_PERTYPE = #{catatan_per_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_PERMOHONANASMAN = #{status_permohonanasman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_ASMAN = #{updated_asman,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CATATAN_ASMAN = #{catatan_asman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_PERMOHONANMANAGER = #{status_permohonanmanager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_MANAGER = #{updated_manager,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CATATAN_MANAGER = #{catatan_manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{created_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER = #{created_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updated_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_USER = #{updated_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_GM = #{updated_gm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CATATAN_GM = #{catatan_gm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_PERMOHONAN_GM = #{status_permohonan_gm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where T_IDOSS_VERIFIKASI_ID = #{t_idoss_verifikasi_id}
